description: It's easy to use. and very helpful. Good work!

i've recently begun with mindmapping my ideas & projects, this tool really helps me further enhance productivity and clear the fog that sometimes occupies my brain when starting on a new project my just mapping out the project.

Also using this at work for explaining some ideas in an orderly fashion.
Great tool!
It helps me organize information and make better sense of my world.
summary: Great app. I always use it

description: Super powerful mind map manager!
summary: This program is the best thing in all my life

description: The file selector does not show the available directories. I think it's failing to follow symlinks properly, but that makes it pretty useless. Opening files by a right mouse click throws an error because the path is not found, again that's not good.
summary: Looked good until I tried to load/save

description: Very good app. Nice work, hoping for the improvements.
I've used Freeplane for many years. Excellent tool for taking notes, organizing and planning writing projects, and to-do lists.
summary: Great tool for organizing and planning

description: Using it for mapping my YouTube videos. The fact that I can put in the URL to the video, notes about the video, and then map the connections from end-screens to the other videos is priceless.

This snap cannot access drives other than ~home as the 'removable-media' plug is not enabled.

These are the enabled plugs:
  - cups-control
  - desktop
  - desktop-legacy
  - home
  - network
  - x11
summary: Cannot access external drives: 'removable-media' not enabled

description: App keeps loading & not able to open after installing new update.
the snap version does not get part the launch splash screen
summary: the snap version does not get part the launch splash screen

description:
Every second branch is connected to the other, meaning if I move branch 2, I'll move branches 4, 6, 8 and so on.

In this state, it is useless.

I tried a few and in my opinion it's the greatest opensource mindmapping tool.
I was using xmind before which was great but you have limited features unless you pay for a subscription!
The only con with freeplane on ubuntu is that the snap version is not up to date.
Simple and intuitive, and fits my workflow really well. Recommendation!

It's written in Java.
It's big.
It's slow.
Minder is our choice.
The app may be good (therefore the 2 stars), but it failed to start after installation. I just guess the issue could be related to snap. Oh snap!

It has taken some time, but the developers have now produced a useful piece of software. Initially it is not may not be straight forward to use, but is definately worth the effort to learn. This does not take long if you use the youtube tutorials online. 

Applications: Apart from the obvious, Identifiying locations where you store or need to look for information arouund one or more computer and the web. It is an ideal enhancement for grouping and finding items in your directories and folders.
summary: Very good and useful piece of software

description: ich habe eine mindmap mit 1.8.xxx erstellt. die wird auch mit 1.7.xxx geöffnet und auch mit dieser Version

Cannot open files created with v1.7.10 on Linux or 1.10.5 on Windows.
Happens on two machines (Ubuntu 20.04 and 22.04).

Fehler: snap "freeplane-mindmapping" has no plug named "removable-media"
can't access my file
Me gusta su simplicidad.
Quizá poder sincronizarse con alguna nube y mejorar algunos elementos de diseño, pero por lo demás, es la mejor que conozco
summary: Es muy buena aunque le faltan algunos detalles

description: Fácil de usar, atractiva y moderna interfaz. Muy recomendable.
summary: Para mi está excelente, aemás me encanta la interfaz gráfica

description:
Utilisateur de cartes heuristiques ou "mindmaps" depuis de nombreuses années, j'ai voulu tester cette application pour son interface un peu plus moderne que celle de FreeMind. 
J'en suis revenu, car beaucoup de fonctions me manquaient, surtout le fait de pouvoir insérer des icones qui sont indispensables pour le côté visuel de la carte.

le snap ne demande pas les autorisations d'acces etndues pendant son installation. c'est un probleme pour moi car mes fichiers sont sur un repertoire NFS NAS sur lequel j'ai les droits mais le snap est confiné sur le $HOME par defaut.

Невозможно добавить дочерний узел, хотелось бы лично сказать тому, кто придумал назначить на клавишу isert функцию добавления дочернего узла тогда как в любой другой программе клавиша tab.
Да блин! У меня на mac os стоит freeplan и там эта функция назначена как положено на tab!
Под UbuntuStudio 19 не видит содержимого каталога /media и не открывает с флешек
